itemTooltip.xiaoanfc.stir_stick_1: When a Bowl is crafted into a Mixing Bowl, the item will
itemTooltip.xiaoanfc.stir_stick_2: be consumed when the Mixing Bowl is crafted with other
itemTooltip.xiaoanfc.stir_stick_3: items, and the Mixing Bowl will be converted into a Bowl.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.xiaoanfc: This is the core mod to use every Xiaoan's Farming mod. You can use Sinytra Connector to use this mod in Forge.
